response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $8,000 to us, reflecting its quality, uniqueness, and the expertise involved in its creation. We believe it could be an invaluable asset to you, offering unparalleled benefits and features tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its high value and the potential it holds for you, we are extending an exclusive offer to acquire this product at a special price of $7,200. We are confident that this opportunity will not only meet but exceed your expectations. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
